You awaken in a dimly lit spaceship, your head spinning and memories fuzzy. As you slowly regain your senses, you realize you are in the cockpit of a sleek, high-tech spacecraft hurtling through the vastness of space. Outside your window, Earth is a small blue orb, gradually fading into the distance. You hear the hum of the engines as the ship speeds on its mysterious course. Suddenly, a holographic display flickers to life in front of you, showing a distress signal from a nearby star cruiser. Will you respond and investigate?

1. Proceed to investigate the distress signal.
2. Ignore the distress signal and continue on your current course.
3. Try to locate your own ship's controls.
4. Look for any weapons or defensive systems on the spacecraft.
